#### 组件名称
smt-clfe-chart

#### 解释：
图表组件， 提供了常规的折线图、柱状图、饼图, 支持SVG + Canvas两种渲染引擎, 使用扁平化数据配置完成开发

#### 属性说明：
|属性名 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 |说明 |
|---|---|---|---|---|
|chartOptions |Object |是||图表数据及样式参数|

#### 代码示例
swan:
```
<view class="clfe-chart-container">
    <view class="chart-inner-container">  
        <view>
            <view class="container-chart">
                <view class="item-title tab border-bottom">折线图</view>
                <view s-if="m2activeName == 'm2single'" class="btn-group">
                    <button type="primary" bindtap="showViewM2" data-type="single">单折线图</button>
                    <button type="defualt" bindtap="showViewM2" data-type="multi">复合折线图</button>
                </view>
                <view s-elif="m2activeName == 'm2multi'" class="btn-group">
                    <button type="defualt" bindtap="showViewM2" data-type="single">单折线图</button>
                    <button type="primary" bindtap="showViewM2" data-type="multi">复合折线图</button>
                </view>
                <view class="chart-single-content">
                    <smt-clfe-chart chart-options="{{m2Chartoptions}}" />
                </view>
            </view>

            <view class="setting">
                <view class="item-title item-scroll block border-bottom">自定义样式</view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">显示图例(Lenged)</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeLengendM2" checked></switch>
                </view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">负值状态</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeNegativeValueM2"></switch>
                </view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">正负值状态</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeCrossValueM2"></switch>
                </view>
            </view>
        </view>

        <view>
            <view class="container-chart">
                <view class="item-title tab border-bottom">柱状图</view>
                <view s-if="m1activeName == 'm1single'" class="btn-group">
                    <button type="primary" bindtap="showViewM1" data-type="single">单柱图</button>
                    <button type="defualt" bindtap="showViewM1" data-type="multi">复合柱图</button>
                </view>
                <view s-elif="m1activeName == 'm1multi'" class="btn-group">
                    <button type="defualt" bindtap="showViewM1" data-type="single">单柱图</button>
                    <button type="primary" bindtap="showViewM1" data-type="multi">复合柱图</button>
                </view>
                <view class="chart-single-content">
                    <smt-clfe-chart chart-options="{{m1Chartoptions}}" />
                </view>
            </view>

            <view class="setting">
                <view class="item-title item-scroll block border-bottom">自定义样式</view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">柱图横向展示</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeZoom"></switch>
                </view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">显示图例(Lenged)</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeLengendM1" checked></switch>
                </view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">负值状态</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeNegativeValueM1"></switch>
                </view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">正负值状态</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeCrossValueM1"></switch>
                </view>
            </view>
        </view>
        
        <view>
            <view class="container-chart">
                <view class="item-title tab border-bottom">饼状图</view>
                <view s-if="m3activeName == 'm3single'" class="btn-group">
                    <button type="primary" bindtap="showViewM3" data-type="single">饼状图</button>
                    <button type="defualt" bindtap="showViewM3" data-type="multi">环状图</button>
                </view>
                <view s-elif="m3activeName == 'm3multi'" class="btn-group">
                    <button type="defualt" bindtap="showViewM3" data-type="single">饼状图</button>
                    <button type="primary" bindtap="showViewM3" data-type="multi">环状图</button>
                </view>
                <view class="chart-single-content">
                    <smt-clfe-chart chart-options="{{m3Chartoptions}}" />
                </view>
            </view>

            <view class="setting">
                <view class="item-title item-scroll block border-bottom">自定义样式</view>
                <view class="item-scroll block border-bottom">
                    <text class="switch-text">显示图例(Lenged)</text>
                    <switch bindchange="changeLengendM3" checked></switch>
                </view>
            </view>
        </view>
    </view>
</view>

```
js:
```
const SERIES_SINGLE_NEGAVITE = [
    {
        name: '成交量1',
        data: [-42, -26, -17, -32]
    }
];

const SERIES_SINGLE_CROSS = [
    {
        name: '成交量1',
        data: [-32, 35, -17, 32]
    }
];

const SERIES_SINGLE = [
    {
        name: '成交量1',
        data: [42, 26, 17, 32]
    }
];

const SERIES_MULTI = [
    {
        name: '成交量1',
        data: [42, 26, 17]
    },
    {
        name: '成交量2',
        data: [26, 32, 42]
    },
    {
        name: '成交量3',
        data: [32, 17, 32]
    }
];

const SERIES_MULTI_NEGAVITE = [
    {
        name: '成交量1',
        data: [-42, -26, -17]
    },
    {
        name: '成交量2',
        data: [-26, -32, -42]
    },
    {
        name: '成交量3',
        data: [-32, -17, -32]
    }
];

const SERIES_MULTI_CROSS = [
    {
        name: '成交量1',
        data: [42, -26, 17]
    },
    {
        name: '成交量2',
        data: [-26, 32, -42]
    },
    {
        name: '成交量3',
        data: [-32, 17, -32]
    }
];

const SERIES_PIE = [
    {
        data: 3,
        name: '成交量1'
    },
    {
        data: 4,
        name: '成交量2'
    },
    {
        data: 3,
        name: '成交量3'
    },
    {
        data: 2,
        name: '成交量4'
    },
    {
        data: 5,
        name: '成交量5'
    },
    {
        data: 4,
        name: '成交量6'
    }
];

const CHART_DATA = {
    m1singleChartoptions: {
        canvasWidth: 340,
        canvasHeight: 350,
        canvasId: 'chartBar',
        animation: 10000,
        type: 'bar',
        legend: {
            show: true
        },
        tooltip: {
            show: true
        },
        yAxis: {
            type: 'value'
        },
        xAxis: {
            type: 'category',
            data: ['2017', '2018', '2019', '2020']
        },
        series: SERIES_SINGLE
    },
    m2singleChartoptions: {
        canvasWidth: 340,
        canvasHeight: 350,
        canvasId: 'chartLine',
        animation: 10000,
        type: 'line',
        legend: {
            show: true
        },
        tooltip: {
            show: true
        },
        yAxis: {
            type: 'value'
        },
        xAxis: {
            type: 'category',
            data: ['2017', '2018', '2019', '2020']
        },
        series: SERIES_SINGLE
    },
    m3singleChartoptions: {
        canvasWidth: 340,
        canvasHeight: 350,
        canvasId: 'chartPie',
        animation: 10000,
        type: 'pie',
        startAngle: -180,
        legend: {
            show: true
        },
        tooltip: {
            show: true
        },
        yAxis: {
            type: 'value'
        },
        xAxis: {
            type: 'category',
            data: ['类别1', '类别2', '类别3', '类别4']
        },
        series: SERIES_PIE
    },
    m1multiChartoptions: {
        canvasWidth: 340,
        canvasHeight: 350,
        canvasId: 'chartBar',
        animation: 10000,
        type: 'bar',
        legend: {
            show: true
        },
        tooltip: {
            show: true
        },
        yAxis: {
            type: 'value'
        },
        xAxis: {
            type: 'category',
            data: ['2018', '2019', '2020']
        },
        series: SERIES_MULTI
    },
    m2multiChartoptions: {
        canvasWidth: 340,
        canvasHeight: 350,
        canvasId: 'chartLine',
        animation: 10000,
        type: 'line',
        legend: {
            show: true
        },
        tooltip: {
            show: true
        },
        yAxis: {
            type: 'value'
        },
        xAxis: {
            type: 'category',
            data: ['2018', '2019', '2020']
        },
        series: SERIES_MULTI
    },
    m3multiChartoptions: {
        canvasWidth: 340,
        canvasHeight: 350,
        canvasId: 'chartPie',
        animation: 10000,
        type: 'pie',
        startAngle: -180,
        radius: [80, 90],
        legend: {
            show: true
        },
        tooltip: {
            show: true
        },
        yAxis: {
            type: 'value'
        },
        xAxis: {
            type: 'category',
            data: ['类别1', '类别2', '类别3', '类别4']
        },
        series: SERIES_PIE
    }
};
Page({
    properties: {},
    data: {
        tabs: [
            {
                name: 'm1',
                label: '柱状图'
            },
            {
                name: 'm2',
                label: '折线图'
            },
            {
                name: 'm3',
                label: '饼状图'
            }
        ],
        m1Chartoptions: CHART_DATA.m1singleChartoptions,
        m2Chartoptions: CHART_DATA.m2singleChartoptions,
        m3Chartoptions: CHART_DATA.m3singleChartoptions,
        activeType: 'single',
        m1activeName: 'm1single',
        m2activeName: 'm2single',
        m3activeName: 'm3single',
        statusBarHeight: 20
    },

    showViewM1(e) {
        const type = e.target.dataset.type;
        this.setData({
            m1Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m1${type}Chartoptions`]
            },
            activeType: type,
            m1activeName: `m1${type}`
        });
    },

    showViewM2(e) {
        const type = e.target.dataset.type;
        this.setData({
            m2Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m2${type}Chartoptions`]
            },
            activeType: type,
            m2activeName: `m2${type}`
        });
    },

    showViewM3(e) {
        const type = e.target.dataset.type;
        this.setData({
            m3Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m3${type}Chartoptions`]
            },
            activeType: type,
            m3activeName: `m3${type}`
        });
    },

    changeLengendM1(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        this.setData({
            m1Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m1${type}Chartoptions`],
                legend: {
                    show: e.detail.checked
                }
            }
        });
    },

    changeLengendM2(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        this.setData({
            m2Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m2${type}Chartoptions`],
                legend: {
                    show: e.detail.checked
                }
            }
        });
    },

    changeLengendM3(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        this.setData({
            m3Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m3${type}Chartoptions`],
                legend: {
                    show: e.detail.checked
                }
            }
        });
    },

    changeZoom(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        const isChecked = e.detail.checked;
        // x轴和y轴互换数据
        const yAxis = CHART_DATA[`m1${type}Chartoptions`].yAxis;
        const xAxis = CHART_DATA[`m1${type}Chartoptions`].xAxis;
        this.setData({
            m1Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m1${type}Chartoptions`],
                yAxis: isChecked ? xAxis : yAxis,
                xAxis: isChecked ? yAxis : xAxis
            }
        });
    },

    changeNegativeValueM1(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        this.setData({
            m1Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m1${type}Chartoptions`],
                series: e.detail.checked
                    ? (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE_NEGAVITE : SERIES_MULTI_NEGAVITE)
                    : (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE : SERIES_MULTI)
            }
        });
    },

    changeNegativeValueM2(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        this.setData({
            m2Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m2${type}Chartoptions`],
                series: e.detail.checked
                    ? (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE_NEGAVITE : SERIES_MULTI_NEGAVITE)
                    : (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE : SERIES_MULTI)
            }
        });
    },


    changeCrossValueM1(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        this.setData({
            m1Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m1${type}Chartoptions`],
                series: e.detail.checked
                    ? (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE_CROSS : SERIES_MULTI_CROSS)
                    : (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE : SERIES_MULTI)
            }
        });
    },

    changeCrossValueM2(e) {
        const type = this.data.activeType;
        this.setData({
            m2Chartoptions: {
                ...CHART_DATA[`m2${type}Chartoptions`],
                series: e.detail.checked
                    ? (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE_CROSS : SERIES_MULTI_CROSS)
                    : (type === 'single' ? SERIES_SINGLE : SERIES_MULTI)
            }
        });
    }
});

```
css:
```
.clfe-chart-container {
    font-size: .16rem;
}

.chart-inner-container {
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.container-chart {
    margin: .14rem .13rem 0 .13rem;
    background-color: #fff;
    border-radius: .08rem;
    padding-bottom: .13rem;
}

.btn-group {
    display: flex;
}

.chart-single-content {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center;
}

.setting {
    margin: .14rem .13rem 0 .13rem;
    background-color: #fff;
    border-radius: .08rem;
}

.item-title {
    font-size: .15rem;
    color: #333;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.tab {
    display: block;
    padding: .17rem;
    border-radius: .08rem .08rem 0 0;
    background-color: #fff;
}
```
